it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayerBehaviour, java.lang.Comparable<Player>

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerBehaviour, java.lang.Comparable<Player>
    This class is used to represent the players in the game
    Author:
    Francesco Nicotera

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Player.ScoreComparator 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ColorOfFigure_Square colorOfFigure
      Records the colour of the player
      private boolean hasToBeGenerated
      It's true if the player has to be spawn, false otherwise.
      private boolean isConnected
      It's true if the client relative of this player is still connected, false otherwise.
      private boolean isDead
      It's true if the player is dead during the turn, false otherwise.
      private boolean isDirectlyOverkilled
      It's true if the list of damage of the player pass during the turn from a number lower than 11 to 12.
      private boolean isFirst
      It is true if the player is the first of the turn
      private boolean isOverSixDamage
      It is used to distinguish if the player can move one position before shooting
      private boolean isUnderThreeDamage
      It is used to distinguish if the player can move two position before catching
      private java.lang.String nickname
      It's unique for every player
      private int numOfKillDoneInTheTurn
      The number of the killing done by the player during the turn to check if it deserve the bonus for double kill.
      private PlayerBoard playerBoard
      The reference to player's board
      private int position
      The position of the player in the turn
      private Square positionOnTheMap
      The square in which the player is during the game
      private int score
      It is used at the end of the game to calculate the final ranking

      Player(java.lang.String nickname, boolean isFirst, int position, ColorOfFigure_Square colorOfFigure)
      Constructor of the class where nickname, position in the round, color of figure and the boolean that states if the player is the first or not, are initialized.

      Handles the use of targeting scope assigning the damage to the player already attacked and passed by parameter and removing the power up card used and tha ammo/power up card used to pay the effect.

      • shoot

        public void shoot(int effect,
                  WeaponCard weaponCard,
                  java.util.ArrayList<InvolvedPlayer> involvedPlayers,
                  ColorOfCard_Ammo[] priceToPay,
                  java.util.ArrayList<PowerUpCard> powerUpToDiscard)
        Receiving the effect to use, the weapon card to use, the list of involved players of the attack, this method calls the useWeapon of the correct weapon card. If priceToPay is not null, it means that the effect has a price and if the list of power up card is not empty it means that to pay this cost the player has to discard power up cards.
        Specified by:
        shoot in interface PlayerBehaviour
        Parameters:
        effect - The number of the effect of the weapon that player wants to use.
        weaponCard - The weapon card that player wants to use.
        involvedPlayers - The list of the objects containing player or/and square involved in the effect.
        priceToPay - The price to pay to use the effect
        powerUpToDiscard - The list of power up cards that the player has decided to discard to contribute to the payment of the effect.

      • catchWeapon

        public void catchWeapon(WeaponCard weaponCard,
                        java.util.ArrayList<PowerUpCard> powerUpCardToDiscard)
        It is called when a player decides to catch a weapon
        Specified by:
        catchWeapon in interface PlayerBehaviour
        Parameters:
        weaponCard - the weapon the player want to catch
        powerUpCardToDiscard - The list of power up cards that the player has decided to discard to contribute to the payment for the weapon.

                                           ColorOfCard_Ammo ammo)
        Get the powerUp card of the color passed by parameter inside of the list of power up card passed always by parameter.
        Returns:
        The reference of a power up card of the color passed by parameter.

      • useTargetingScope

        public void useTargetingScope(Player playerToAttack,
                              PowerUpCard targetingScope,
                              ColorOfCard_Ammo ammoToDiscard,
                              PowerUpCard powerUpCardToDiscard)
        Handles the use of targeting scope assigning the damage to the player already attacked and passed by parameter and removing the power up card used and tha ammo/power up card used to pay the effect.
        Specified by:
        useTargetingScope in interface PlayerBehaviour
        Parameters:
        playerToAttack - The player to attack with the effect of targeting scope.
        targetingScope - The power up card to use.
        ammoToDiscard - The ammo to discard to pay the effect.
        powerUpCardToDiscard - The power up card to discard to pay the effect.

      • useTagbackGranade

        public void useTagbackGranade(PowerUpCard tagback,
                              Player playerToAttack)
        Handles the use of tagback granade assigning a mark to the player attacked previously and passed by parameter and then removing the power up card from the deck.
        Specified by:
        useTagbackGranade in interface PlayerBehaviour
        Parameters:
        tagback - The power up card that player decides to use.
        playerToAttack - The player who give the mark for the use of the effect of the tagback.

      • reload

        public void reload(WeaponCard card,
                   java.util.ArrayList<PowerUpCard> powerUpCardsToDiscard)
        Handles the reload of a weapon card and his payment, eventually with a list of power up cards to discard.
        Specified by:
        reload in interface PlayerBehaviour
        Parameters:
        card - The weapon card that player wants to reload.
        powerUpCardsToDiscard - The list of power up cards that the player has decided to discard to contribute to the payment of the reload.
